'''Bow Valley High School''' is a public [[secondary school]] located in the township of [[Cochrane, Alberta]], [[Canada]]. The school falls under the jurisdiction of the [[Rocky View Schools Division]]. The school's enrollment is approximately 500 to 550 students, in grades 9 through 12.<ref>http://plone.rockyview.ab.ca/bowvalley</ref>
==Athletics== The Bow Valley High Bobcats has membership in the [[Rocky View Sports Association]]<ref>http://www.rockyviewsports.com/member_schools.html</ref>, and competes and participates in the [[South Central Zone of the Alberta Schools' Athletic Association|South Central Zone]] of the [[Alberta Schools Athletic Association]].
